Options to configure spells:
Big Arms
You can wield 2-handed weapons in one hand.
Silent Assassin
You are 15% harder to detect while gagged, increased to 30% while fully gagged.
Hyperfocus
Metamagic that empowers your spells. Your next spell always critically strikes.|(You can only apply one metamagic at a time.)
You recite an empowering mantra!
Hyperfocus: Your next spell always crits!
Supercritical
Metamagic that empowers your spells. Your next spell always super-critically strikes for 1.5x damage.|(You can only apply one metamagic at a time.)
You recite an intensifying mantra!
Supercritical: Your next spell is super-critical!
Dark Scattershot
Throw a fan of Shadow Daggers towards the target location, dealing 25 shadow damage in a cone.
You flick your wrist and unleash a fan of shadowy blades!
You summon several shadow daggers between your fingers...
Whirling Scythe
Whirling Scythe
Throw a shadowy scythe into the distance, dealing a delayed DamageDealt damage in an area. Cannot strike targets within its minimum range. Deals 50% more damage while you are in shadow.
Your shadow scythe cleaves into the distance!
Choose AoE location
Blade of Darkness
When enabled: Melee weapons deal +15 shadow damage, and your tools become magical, gaining cut power. Damage and cut power bonuses are doubled while you are in shadow.
Your tool glows with shadow energy!
Wicked Edges
Shadow damage curses the target, dealing 3 shadow damage per turn for 10 turns. Damage is doubled while the target remains in shadow.
Hex of Darkness
Hexes the target area for Duration turns, shrouding it in darkness. All creatures within gain a massive evasion buff.
Select where to center the shroud (SpellArea radius)
You curse the very ground into darkness!

Blocks light

Purging Cross

Leap of Faith
Instantly teleport up to 3 tiles away.  You are blinded for 15 turns upon arrival.
You leap blindly into the distance!
Choose target location (3 tile range)
Divine Guidance
Entrust your blade to the angels, gaining up to 60% accuracy while blinded, increasing with the strength of your blind.
Wrathful Smite
Wrathful Smite
When enabled: Melee attacks call down wrath from on high, dealing an additional DamageDealt holy damage after a delay.
Leather Whip
For both adventurers and the aspiring dominatrix.
Deals heavy pain damage. Highly distracting. Can perform a ranged pulling attack for attack + sprint cost. Offhand: +10 pain damage on attack for 8 stamina.
You pick up a rugged leather whip.
Make a ranged attack with the whip, pulling your target close to you.
Whip Lash
There's an obstacle in the way!
(The SPEAKER giggles)|Look at you!|You're a proper adventurer now.
Thorn Whip
You cannot escape the thorns' embrace.
Deals pain damage and applies vine restraints. Highly distracting. Can perform a ranged pulling attack for attack + sprint cost.
You cautiously pick up a thorn-covered whip.
Make a ranged attack with the whip, pulling your target close to you.
Blooming Agony
A beautiful rose, but she's all thorns.
Deals distracting pierce damage and applies vine restraints. Can perform a ranged pulling attack for attack + sprint cost.

Make a ranged attack with the whip, pulling your target close to you.
Tentacle Lash
This wiggly whip almost seems to have a mind of its own...
Deals grope damage and applies 25 slime binding. This stretchy whip can perform a longer-ranged pulling attack for attack + sprint cost.
You pick up a slimy tentacle on a handle.
Make a ranged attack with the whip, pulling your target close to you.
Ice Queen's Kiss
The cold will numb their pain.
Deals an additional 20 ice damage, with a 25% chance to freeze. Highly distracting. Can perform a ranged pulling attack for attack + sprint cost.
You shiver as you pick up an enchanted white latex whip.
Make a ranged attack with the whip, pulling your target close to you.
Halberd
Hit them with the sweet spot!
Ranged attacks deal heavy slash damage. Close-range attacks cost 30 SP and deal 30 crush damage instead, knocking the target back.
You pick up a halberd.

Silver Labrys
Imposing and regal, fit for a princess.
Ranged attacks deal heavy slash damage in an arc. Close-range attacks cost 35 SP and deal 35 crush damage instead, knocking the target back.
You pick up a gleaming silver labrys.

Royal Halberd
A giant, garish, but supremely effective weapon.
Ranged attacks deal severe slash damage. Close-range attacks cost 35 SP and deal 35 crush damage instead, knocking the target back.
